title: Job Competency Strengthening Program Utilizing a Personalized Instruction System

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social studies knowledge and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Customized learning for professionals to enhance social sector job competencies. Blended format combining smartphone-based materials with monthly face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners are assessed as understanding over 85% of core concepts related to social domain job tasks through personalized instructional systems
Learners will complete and submit 100% of job-applicable projects by the end of the 6-month course
Learners will establish self-directed learning plans and achieve a 90%+ target completion rate every 4 weeks

resources: Practical textbooks for social studies fields
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
